Some participants discussed having to change the time of the day when they took their medicines, and adapt day-to-day activities to cope with side effects:
The doses at 5 … when I was in school I tried switching it to me taking it in the morning…it wasn't really such a good idea but that feeling of being high at school was not the best situation, I don't like that at all because I mean I can't concentrate, [I] feel like I'm not really there. (USA, CT arm)
